name: To Hell With You!
description:
Sent to hell, mortal, The fierce warrior of the overworld try to find his ways out of hell. His not alone, In his journeys, he found a punish god trap in a cristal, ball. This godly spirit is deprived off any motion, However , he is still able to cast deadly spear to tear throught hell servant. Will you be up for the task?

!NEW COOP FEATURE! play with your friends!(localy tho cause internet is hard)

This is my first game jam and the first time ever I finnish a game, this jam was a lot of fun and even tho its not much

it's honest work 

considering I did everything my self (exept the sound effects Unity asset store for life<3 )

I learned a lot and will be forever grateful if you give this game a shot>

Have a nice day!
